column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ashley - Thanks for your review. I hope that you are able to try some of our other ramen bowls before passing final judgment on us! A perusal of our reviews will demonstrate quite a few customers who gave us a second run only to find another dish to suit their liking. Regardless
column2: we are grateful you gave us a chance in the first place and appreciate your time and kind words.
